name: places/ChIJq5lho5j3wokRhmut-Cp4ljc
formattedAddress: 246 W 102nd St, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 246 W 102nd St, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text:
I forgot why I stopped seeing Verdit.
Many years later, when my stylist moved out of state, a friend recommended Verdit, so I tried again, I saw her 3 times always saying one length, no shag. This fall I came very, very tired all I said was I'd like it short. I ended up with Bob and about 30 layers. I'm furious, absolutely hate it.
I will never see her again.  The Bob is her thing, not mine. Whether you like it or not, it's her signature cut.
I was way too tired to notice right away. Or I would not have paid her.
I told her that as soon as I realized what she did, I did want my money back, it will take at least 2 years to get all these layers out. After telling her how unhappy I was and that I want my money back. She ran to cash the check. IMHO character is flawed as well.

originalText.text: Love Vardit! So friendly and gives me an awesome haircut every time.

text.text: Love Vardit! So friendly and gives me an awesome haircut every time.

originalText.text: She is warm and friendly and asks  a lot of questions to learn you better. I liked my service very much until the $100 up charge at the end. My service was about 3.5 hours and I have a lot of hair( never charged extra). It was in shock but mostly I was very lucky I could pay that in todays challenging times.God is good. I was informed that the haircut was $90 when I walked in. So I paid a extra $190 from phone quote.Great hair stylist otherwise and will have you looking gorgeous. Bring extra cash or check as no cards are used here.

originalText.text: My hair was becoming unruly and frizzy. Vardit gave me a new style and a great cut !

originalText.text: So friendly and helpful! Love the haircut!
